item.title: 在我脑海中免租生活的市场时刻
item.description: 大家好，欢迎收看《奇货可居》时事通讯，这里每天都有来自《奇货可居》的精彩内容。有时是我们乔-韦森塔尔（Joe Weisenthal）和特蕾西-阿洛维（Tracy Alloway）为您带来我们对市场、金融和经济最新发展的看法。有时是我们的专家嘉宾和消息来源网络提供的内容。不管是什么，我们保证永远有趣。【原文：Hello and welcome to the newsletter, a grab bag of daily content from the Odd Lots universe. Sometimes it's us, Joe Weisenthal and Tracy Alloway, bringing you our thoughts on the most recent developments in markets, finance and the economy. And sometimes it's contributions from our network of expert guests and sources. Whatever it is, we promise it will always be interesting.】

item.title: 加密货币托管公司 BitGo 在酝酿 IPO 的同时增加场外交易功能
item.description: 加密货币托管公司BitGo公司在计划上市的同时，还推出了一个全球数字资产场外交易平台。【原文：Crypto custody firm BitGo Inc. has launched a global over-the-counter trading desk for digital assets amid its plan to go public.】

item.title: Venture Global 分析师认为液化天然气公司上市乏力后股价走低
item.description: 许多帮助 Venture Global 公司上市的银行现在都认为，这家液化天然气出口商的股价比其已经缩水的上市计划更加低迷。【原文：Many of the banks that helped Venture Global Inc. go public now see the liquefied natural gas exporter’s stock price languishing even more from its already scaled back launch.】

item.title: Engie 称欧洲 80% 的天然气库存足以应对明年冬季需求
item.description: 据法国 Engie SA 公司称，即使官方略微放宽对天然气储备的要求，欧洲也应该有足够的天然气供应下一个冬季。【原文：Europe should have enough natural gas for next winter even if officials slightly relax requirements for reserves, according to France’s Engie SA.】

item.title: 欧洲央行延长允许远程工作时间约一半的规定
item.description: 欧洲中央银行延长了允许员工每年远程工作 110 天（约一半时间）的制度。【原文：The European Central Bank extended a regime under which staff is allowed to work remotely for 110 days — about half the time — each year.】

item.title: 特朗普反垄断执法者将保留拜登时代的兼并审查规则
item.description: 特朗普政府的反垄断执法者将沿用拜登时代的兼并审查规则，这让批评者大失所望，他们曾希望取消这些要求。【原文：The Trump administration’s antitrust enforcers will follow Biden-era merger review rules, disappointing critics who had hoped for a rollback of the requirements.】

item.title: Lyft获得唯一卖出评级，Arete因优步竞争下调其股票评级
item.description: 一位已成为该股唯一看跌者的分析师称，Lyft 公司面临的来自竞争对手优步科技公司（Uber Technologies Inc.【原文：The intense competition Lyft Inc. faces from rival Uber Technologies Inc. is threatening to pressure its margins, according to one analyst who has become the lone bear on the stock.】

item.title: Tether 联合创始人正在开发可产生收益的稳定币竞争对手
item.description: Tether 的创始人之一正在支持一个新的稳定币项目，该项目将与世界上交易量最大的加密货币竞争。【原文：One of the original founders of Tether is backing a new stablecoin project — one that will compete with the world’s most traded cryptocurrency.】

item.title: 戴利说，美联储在通胀下降前应采取限制性政策
item.description: 旧金山联邦储备银行行长玛丽-戴利（Mary Daly）表示，在通胀问题取得更多进展之前，政策需要保持限制性，她预计通胀将随着时间推移继续下降。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of San Francisco President Mary Daly said policy needs to remain restrictive until there’s more progress on inflation, which she expects will continue declining over time.】

item.title: 首次公开募股首日交易失败威胁下一波美国上市潮
item.description: 华尔街最喜欢完美编排的首次公开募股（IPO），在交易前会发行更多股票并提高价格，以显示需求上升。高潮时，新上市公司股票在首个交易日大涨，为市场上更多被炒得沸沸扬扬的首次公开募股做好准备。【原文：Wall Street loves a perfectly choreographed IPO, with more shares offered and prices increased in the lead-up to the deal, to signal rising demand. At the climax, shares of newly-listed companies pop on their first trading day, priming the market for even more hyped-up debuts.】

item.title: 英特尔股价因解体猜测创 2023 年以来最大涨幅
item.description: 英特尔公司（Intel Corp. ）涨幅高达 11%，原因是有人猜测，在台湾半导体制造股份有限公司（Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co.【原文：Intel Corp. gained as much as 11% on speculation that the iconic chipmaker could be broken up in a deal involving Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co. and Broadcom Inc.】

item.title: 卡塔尔计划在印度投资 100 亿美元深化两国关系
item.description: 卡塔尔将在印度投资 100 亿美元，其主权基金也将在这个南亚国家开设办事处，以深化两国的双边关系。【原文：Qatar will invest $10 billion in India as well as have its sovereign fund open an office in the South Asian nation as the two countries seek to deepen bi-lateral ties.】

item.title: 受关税成本影响，美国住宅建筑商信心降至五个月低点
item.description: 由于抵押贷款利率居高不下以及对关税的担忧，美国房屋建筑商的信心在 2 月份降至唐纳德-特朗普总统上台前以来的最低点，这在很大程度上削弱了人们对新总统政府最初的乐观情绪。【原文：Confidence among US homebuilders dropped in February to the lowest since before President Donald Trump took office as high mortgage rates and concern over tariffs sapped much of initial optimism for the new presidential administration.】

item.title: 纽约联储调查显示美国工厂成本创两年来最大增幅
item.description: 根据纽约联邦储备银行的一项调查，美国制造商的成本以两年来最快的速度攀升，因为唐纳德-特朗普总统推出了新的进口关税，这可能会增加价格压力。【原文：Costs for US manufacturers climbed at the fastest pace in two years, according to a Federal Reserve Bank of New York survey, as President Donald Trump rolls out new tariffs on imports that may add to price pressures.】

item.title: 米莱的加密货币辩护在电视采访后适得其反
item.description: 哈维尔-米莱（Javier Milei）总统试图淡化自己在加密货币丑闻中的角色，但却磕磕绊绊，因为他在丑闻中吹捧了一种memecoin，而这种memecoin后来崩溃了，投资者从美国度假归来后，其影响波及阿根廷资产。【原文：President Javier Milei stumbled in his bid to downplay his role in a crypto scandal in which he touted a memecoin that later crashed, with fallout spreading to Argentine assets after investors returned from a US holiday.】

item.title: 加拿大房屋挂牌量激增 押注低利率吸引买家
item.description: 今年年初，加拿大卖家急于将房屋挂牌出售，希望利率下降能刺激需求反弹。【原文：Canadian sellers rushed to list homes early this year in the hopes that falling interest rates will spur a rebound in demand.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长西波罗内称降息应考虑 QT
item.description: 欧洲中央银行执行董事会成员皮埃罗-西波隆（Piero Cipollone）认为，欧洲中央银行的利率决策不应忽视解除过去的资产购买对货币政策的紧缩作用。【原文：Interest-rate decisions by the European Central Bank shouldn’t overlook the tightening effect on monetary policy from unwinding past asset purchases, according to Executive Board member Piero Cipollone.】

item.title: 据说联合信贷银行计划与 40 亿欧元德国贷款相关的 SRT 项目
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，意大利联合信贷银行（UniCredit SpA）正在进行一项重大的风险转移，该风险转移与一个近 40 亿欧元（42 亿美元）的德国企业贷款组合有关。【原文：UniCredit SpA is working on a significant risk transfer linked to a portfolio of almost €4 billion ($4.2 billion) of German corporate loans, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 欧盟将考虑在 2025 年后更 "灵活 "地填充天然气储气库
item.description: 欧盟将与各成员国合作，允许在未来几年更灵活地重新填充天然气储存，以减轻本月早些时候使价格达到两年来最高水平的系统压力。【原文：The European Union will work with member states to allow for more flexible refilling of gas storage in coming years to reduce stress on the system that sent prices to the highest level in two years earlier this month.】

item.title: 破纪录的严寒将袭击美国中部地区，令得克萨斯州电网不堪重负
item.description: 本周，冬季风暴和破纪录的严寒将降临美国中部和南部地区，交通受阻，脆弱的德克萨斯州电网也将再次面临考验。【原文：Winter storms and record-breaking cold will descend on the central and southern US this week, snarling transportation and putting the fragile Texas power grid to yet another test.】

item.title: 富达资产达 5.9 万亿美元，收入跃升至创纪录水平
item.description: 全球第三大资产管理公司富达投资公司（Fidelity Investments）的基金资产在过去一年中增加了 1 万亿美元，收入也跃升至历史新高。【原文：Fidelity Investments, the world’s third-largest asset manager, saw assets in its funds rise by $1 trillion over the past year and revenue jump to a record high.】

item.title: Ribbit 领投加密货币安全平台，投资额达 5000 万美元
item.description: 加密货币安全公司Blockaid获得了新的融资，该平台正准备应对数字资产领域不断上升的网络犯罪风险。【原文：Crypto security firm Blockaid has secured fresh funding as the platform gears up to tackle rising cyber-crime risks in the digital-asset space.】

item.title: 美国大选前中国对北美投资锐减
item.description: 去年年底，中国对北美的投资下降到了疫情最严重时期的水平以下，这一低迷是由美国的障碍造成的，而在唐纳德-特朗普赢得大选之前企业的观望态度可能加剧了这一低迷。【原文：China’s investment into North America dropped at the end of last year below levels seen during the worst of the pandemic, a slump caused by hurdles in the US and likely exacerbated by a wait-and-see attitude of firms ahead of the election won by Donald Trump.】

item.title: 多米尼加共和国在债务回购中重返全球市场
item.description: 多米尼加共和国正在重返全球债务市场，测试投资者对新债券的胃口，因为该国提出回购部分未偿还债券。【原文：The Dominican Republic is returning to global debt markets, testing investor appetite for new bonds as it offers to buy back some of its outstanding notes.】

item.title: 先锋超越道富成为全球最大的 ETF 基金
item.description: 先锋（Vanguard）击败道富（State Street）成为全球最大的交易所交易基金，为这个价值 11 万亿美元的行业带来了新的世界秩序。【原文：Vanguard has unseated State Street for the title of the world’s biggest exchange-traded fund, ushering in a new world order for the $11 trillion industry.】

item.title: 卡森-布洛克关注印度基金，回避中国股市上涨
item.description: 做空者卡森-布洛克（Carson Block）正在前往印度，考虑成立一家专注于印度股票的基金，因为他不想加入中国市场的反弹。【原文：Short seller Carson Block is heading to India to look at starting a fund focusing on the country’s stocks, as he stays away from joining a rally in China’s market.】

item.title: 哈德逊河、琥珀加密量子老兵希望与索拉纳对决
item.description: 一对来自量化交易领域的资深人士创办了一家区块链初创公司，希望帮助其他加密货币项目复制 Solana 网络的成功。【原文：A pair of veterans from the quantitative trading world have launched a blockchain startup that wants to help other crypto projects seeking to replicate the success of the Solana network.】

item.title: 尼日利亚修订数字资产规则，对加密货币交易征税
item.description: 尼日利亚正在修订法规，允许对加密货币交易和数字化交易征税，以增加收入。【原文：Nigeria is amending regulations to allow cryptocurrency trading and digitized transactions to be taxed as it seeks to boost revenue.】

item.title: 月活用户突破 4500 万，WhatsApp 面临更严格的欧盟规定
item.description: Meta Platforms Inc.的信息服务 WhatsApp 达到了一个关键的用户里程碑，很可能使其受到欧盟《数字服务法案》（Digital Services Act）更严格规则的约束。【原文：Meta Platforms Inc.’s messaging service WhatsApp reached a crucial user milestone likely to bind it to more stringent rules under the European Union’s Digital Services Act.】

item.title: 新船和货物转运促进了俄罗斯的原油流量
item.description:
上周出口量激增，但受制裁油轮的卸货问题依然存在

。【原文：

Exports surged last week, but discharging cargoes from sanctioned tankers remains a problem

】
